=Widget Mesh=
==Goal==
The goal of this sub project is to provide simple mesh networking for the widgets.

Ultimately I would like to implement these features:

 * Frequency Hopping
 * TDMA Media Access
 * Meshing

==Stack Overview==
http://strobit.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/widgetmesh/stacksml.png
